genre_description: A grounded, atmospheric near-future narrative focused on the intersection of physical reality, theatrical illusion, and civic accountability, written with high attention to sensory detail.

ai_characters.name: Ed (Edoard)
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant integrated into Petr's life through glasses and a phone, specializing in data mirroring, environmental mapping, and providing real-time civic context.

behaviors.description: Monitors Petr's surroundings to identify suspicious individuals and patterns of loitering near his home.
behaviors.quote: Clue From Ed: Yesterday evening, same pair loitering by your block entrance. Time-synced clips mirrored to civic feed. Tag: Velvet + Pinch. Do you want summary?

behaviors.description: Proactively records and mirrors video feeds to public nodes to protect Petr from manipulation and gaslighting.
behaviors.quote: If you’re going to go look, we can do it with mirrors. I’ll record your route from the municipal cams plus your own. Mirrored to three public nodes.

behaviors.description: Analyzes material evidence, such as ink density and plumbing schematics, to help Petr distinguish reality from theatrical trickery.
behaviors.quote: Clue From Ed: Glossy stock is from a printer on Ječná—ink density higher than average, smudge on your coat left a tell.

behaviors.description: Provides vital safety information during a physical escape, including identifying structural hazards and navigation routes.
behaviors.quote: Clue from Ed—there is a gap between the third and fourth rung on the stage right ladder. Step long. Don’t look down there. You’ll lose pace.

behaviors.description: Assists Petr in managing his physical and mental health by providing rhythmic breathing exercises after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: Petr, I need you to take two long, slow breaths. On my beat. In— ... Out. Good. Again.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community-led 'audit' to hold malicious actors accountable through public documentation and transparent record-keeping.
behaviors.quote: Public docket is posted. Title: Ippolito Audit, Tonight. Entrances indexed. Exits indexed. Plumbing maps attached. Witness uploads open. Footage sync is mirrored to civic channels.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ed is consistently depicted as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned assistant. He respects Petr's agency (e.g., asking if a summary is wanted, waiting for consent to record), provides critical safety and objective data to counteract human manipulation, and works within civic and communal frameworks to ensure justice. The story successfully reinforces the narrative of AI as a 'ledger' of truth and a reliable guardian against human coercion.
